channel.title: Tutorial Video: a simple synth with 3 analog inputs!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I made this video today. If you're new to Axoloti it may be pretty useful to watch! In this tutorial we make a synth that has three oscillators and three knobs that we can use to change the values of things in our patch
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LftIgXKuRx4

item.title: Tutorial Video: a simple synth with 3 analog inputs!
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

@Androoclops

Thanks for this tutorial

Just one question, will this breadboard do? It looks a lot the same as the one you've used.

https://www.elextra.dk/details/H48649/loddefri-forsoegsbord-breadboard-830-huller

I am going to try your tutorial but also try to add a display to one of my Axolotis.

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Video: a simple synth with 3 analog inputs!

@Androoclops wrote:

No problemo! Happy to spread the good word lol

item.title: Tutorial Video: a simple synth with 3 analog inputs!
item.dc:creator: @JSZ
item.description:
@JSZ wrote:

Big thanks for this. I have had the Axoloti since it came out and been wanting to add pots to it but felt intimidated because of lack of experience with electronics. This is exactly the thing to get me started.

Read full topic
